about_the_game:
Artbook for "Bagel Love Story"
This artbook includes:

Character Gallery
Images of all characters featuring various poses, alternate versions, and expressions.
Event Gallery
All game event CGs, including unused images.
Background Gallery
All original background images used in the game.
Miscellaneous Gallery
Various other images used in the game, including chibi versions, promotional comics, and parody images.
Production Notes
Insights and reflections on the game development process.

Available in PDF format. A PDF viewer is required to view this file. The file will be downloaded to the game's installation directory. To access it, right-click the game title in the STEAM games list, select "Properties" then "Local Files" to open the game directory.

name: Bagel Love Story - Artbook
short_description: "Bagel Love Story" Artbook, available in PDF format. This collection includes character galleries, event galleries, background galleries, and production notes. A PDF viewer is required to open this file.
